pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyDID[![pypi release](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/pydid)](https://pypi.org/project/pydid/)[![pre-commit](https://img.shields.io/badge/pre--commit-enabled-brightgreen?logo=pre-commit&logoColor=white)](https://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit)Python library for validating, constructing, and representing DIDs and DID Documents.## InstallationUsing a virtual environment is generally recommended:```sh$ python -m venv env$ source env/bin/activate```Install with pip:```sh$ pip install pydid```## DevelopmentThis project is managed with [Poetry](https://python-poetry.org/).To begin making code changes, clone this repo and do the following to installdependencies:```sh$ python -m venv env$ source env/bin/activate$ pip install poetry$ poetry install```## ContributingSee [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md).
